title: Ugadi Subhakankshalu
content:
Wishing all my visitors, readers and friends a Happy Ugadi and Gudi Padwa.

Ugadi Pachadi

Ugadi Bhojanam
Our lunch spread today

 Paramannam ~ Ugadi Pachadi

 Aratikaya Bajji - Plantain Fritters ~ Pulihora - Tamarind Rice

 Vankaya Vepudu - Brinjal Stir fry ~ Pappu Mamidikaya - Mango Dal

Ugadi Subhakankshalu!
